name: Alexander Mikhalchenko
description: Backend guru by day, DevOps champion by night. Alexander, our senior dev lead, solves puzzles with code and an uncanny knowledge base. He leads the team, tackles any glitch, and dreams in APIs. Need a backend whisperer? Look no further.
shortDescription: Backend guru by day, DevOps champion by night. Aleksander, our senior dev lead, solves puzzles with code and an uncanny knowledge base.
